statements: SELECT id, image_name, feature_vector, date_created FROM ImageFeatures;
SELECT image_name, feature_vector, date_created, id FROM ImageFeatures;
SELECT id, image_name FROM ImageFeatures;
SELECT * FROM ImageFeatures;
SELECT image_name, date_created, id FROM ImageFeatures;
SELECT * FROM ImageFeatures WHERE id = 1;
SELECT image_name, feature_vector FROM ImageFeatures WHERE id = 2 ORDER BY date_created DESC;
SELECT id, image_name FROM ImageFeatures WHERE feature_vector @> ARRAY[1.2, 3.2] AND date_created > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM ImageFeatures WHERE image_name LIKE '%cat%' OR image_name LIKE '%dog%';
SELECT id, date_created FROM ImageFeatures WHERE feature_vector[1] > 0.5 ORDER BY date_created ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT image_id, feature_vector FROM ImageFeatures
SELECT * FROM ImageFeatures WHERE image_id = 1
SELECT image_id, image_name, image_path FROM ImageMetadata
SELECT image_name, image_path, image_id FROM ImageMetadata ORDER BY image_id DESC
SELECT * FROM ImageMetadata WHERE image_id IN (1, 2, 3)
SELECT image_id, image_name, image_path FROM ImageMetadata WHERE image_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM ImageFeatures ORDER BY image_id DESC;
SELECT image_name, image_path FROM ImageMetadata WHERE image_id > 5 AND image_name LIKE '%car%';
SELECT image_id, LENGTH(feature_vector) AS feature_length FROM ImageFeatures WHERE image_id BETWEEN 10 AND 20;
SELECT image_id, COUNT(image_id) AS total_images FROM ImageMetadata GROUP BY image_id HAVING COUNT(image_id) > 1;
SELECT * FROM image_features WHERE id = 1;
SELECT image_path, feature_vector FROM image_features WHERE id = 2;
SELECT id, image_id, tag FROM image_tags WHERE tag = 'nature';
SELECT * FROM image_tags ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT image_id, capture_date FROM image_metadata WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM image_features WHERE id = 1
SELECT image_path FROM image_features WHERE id = 2
SELECT id, MAX(image_path) AS max_path FROM image_features GROUP BY id
SELECT image_id, tag FROM image_tags WHERE tag LIKE '%nature%' ORDER BY image_id DESC
SELECT id, capture_date FROM image_metadata WHERE location = 'Paris'
SELECT * FROM ImageFeatures;
SELECT image_id, tag FROM ImageTags;
SELECT image_id, metadata FROM ImageMetadata WHERE image_id = 1;
SELECT analysis_id, image_id, analysis_result FROM ImageAnalysisResults ORDER BY analysis_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM ImageFeatures WHERE image_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM ImageFeatures;
SELECT image_id, feature_vector FROM ImageFeatures WHERE image_id = 1;
SELECT image_id, tag FROM ImageTags WHERE tag LIKE 'cat%';
SELECT image_id, metadata->>'location' AS location FROM ImageMetadata WHERE image_id = 3;
SELECT analysis_id, image_id, analysis_result FROM ImageAnalysisResults ORDER BY analysis_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT image_id, image_name FROM Images;
SELECT * FROM Objects WHERE object_category = 'Animal';
SELECT image_name, image_path FROM Images ORDER BY image_name DESC;
SELECT object_name FROM Objects WHERE object_id = 3;
SELECT image_id, author, captured_at FROM ImageMetadata WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT image_id, image_name, image_path FROM Images;
SELECT object_id, object_name, object_category FROM Objects ORDER BY object_name DESC;
SELECT image_id, object_id FROM ImageObjects WHERE object_id = 3;
SELECT image_id, tag_name FROM ImageTags WHERE image_id = 1 AND tag_name LIKE '%nature%';
SELECT image_id, captured_at, author, location FROM ImageMetadata WHERE captured_at > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY captured_at DESC;
